A B C D E F G H I L M N O P R S W X Y 

A

angle - Variable in class Missile
 

B

BossEnemy - Class in <Unnamed>
A model object that extends the enemy class that has properties to create an enemy that is larger, faster and that has more lives than the other types of enemies
BossEnemy(double, double) - Constructor for class BossEnemy
Class constructor that creates a boss enemy at the specified coordinates, boss enemies have default properties of a velocity with a total magnitude of 6, a radius of 40, 20 lives and a shootProbability with a range of 100.
Bunker - Class in <Unnamed>
Extends enemy and is a model object for a bunker that is to the enemies advantage, bunkers destroy power ups, have lives and enemy missiles can pass through them.
Bunker(double, double) - Constructor for class Bunker
Class constructor that creates a bunker at the specified coordinates, bunkers have default properties a radius of 40, no velocities, 10 lives and no probability of shooting

C

checkHighScore(int) - Static method in class HighScore
This method takes in an integer and compares this value with each other value in the ArrayList of high scores to see if it is bigger than or smaller than the 5 current values in the ArrayList.
Critter - Interface in <Unnamed>
An interface which has the properties to specify an entity which can move and interact with the canvas

D

decreasePowerUpCounter() - Method in class Shooter
 
DefaultCritter - Class in <Unnamed>
DefaultCritter is the base class for all of the entities that will be created and used in the Cosmic-Conquistadors game, this class implements the Critter interface which gives it the methods to change the coordinates, velocities and radius of the entity.
DefaultCritter(double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class DefaultCritter
Constructor that creates the entity using the variables needed to specify the position, movement and radius of the entity

E

Enemy - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends DefaultCritter and serves as a model object to create different types of enemies
Enemy(double, double, double, double, double, int, int) - Constructor for class Enemy
Class constructor that creates an enemy using the DefaultCritter class as a basis, also adds properties to Enemy by specifying the amount of lives and the probability that the enemy will shoot a missile.
EnemyMissile - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends Missile to add extra functionality for a type of missile that can be used as an enemy missile for the enemies,.
EnemyMissile(Enemy) - Constructor for class EnemyMissile
Creates a EnemyMissile using the Missile class as a basis, uses the Enemy it is shot from to determine its starting x and y coordinates.
EnemyMissile(Enemy, double, Shooter) - Constructor for class EnemyMissile
Creates a EnemyMissile using the Missile class as a basis, this constructor is used for the BossEnemy, it allows the BossEnemy to fire three missiles at once in the direction of a shooter, each missile having a specific angle that is offset from the middle missile.

F

FastMissile - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends Missile to add extra functionality for a type of missile that can be used as a fast missile power up for the shooter, FastMissiles are the same size as NormalMissiles, and do the same amount of damage, however they move much faster.
FastMissile(Shooter) - Constructor for class FastMissile
Creates a FastMissile using the Missile class as a basis, uses the shooter it is shot from to determine its starting x and y coordinates, its starting velocity and its angle specified by the shooter at that instant, as well as its radius.

G

gameLoop() - Method in class InvaderGameState
Runs the main game and calls all necessary methods for movement and updating of game screen.
getAngleBarrel() - Method in class Shooter
 
getLives() - Method in class Enemy
 
getLives() - Method in class Shooter
 
getNumBounced() - Method in class Missile
 
getPower() - Method in class PowerUp
 
getPower() - Method in class Shooter
 
getPowerUpCounter() - Method in class Shooter
 
getRadius() - Method in interface Critter
 
getRadius() - Method in class DefaultCritter
 
getRound() - Method in class InvaderGameState
 
getScore() - Method in class InvaderGameState
 
getTailYCoord() - Method in class StarBackground
Calculates the y position of the top most position of the star.
getXCoord() - Method in interface Critter
 
getXCoord() - Method in class DefaultCritter
 
getXCoordBarrel() - Method in class Shooter
 
getYCoord() - Method in interface Critter
 
getYCoord() - Method in class DefaultCritter
 
getYCoordBarrel() - Method in class Shooter
 

H

HeavyEnemy - Class in <Unnamed>
A model object that extends the enemy class that has properties to create an enemy that is larger, and that has more lives than a normal enemy.
HeavyEnemy(double, double) - Constructor for class HeavyEnemy
Class constructor that creates a heavy enemy at the specified coordinates, heavy enemies have default properties of x-velocities with a magnitude of 5, y-velocities with the magnitude of 50 downwards, 5 lives and a shootProbability with a range of 1500.
HighScore - Class in <Unnamed>
This class consists exclusively of static methods that are used to read and write High Scores to a textfile for the purpose of retrieval at a later stage.
HighScore() - Constructor for class HighScore
 

I

initializeNextRound() - Method in class InvaderGameState
Initilaizes all necessary classes and sets all global variables to necessary values for the next round of the game.
initializeStartRound() - Method in class InvaderGameState
Initilaizes all necessary classes and sets all global variables to necessary values for the starting round of the game.
InvaderGameState - Class in <Unnamed>
 
InvaderGameState() - Constructor for class InvaderGameState
 
Invaders - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Invaders() - Constructor for class Invaders
 
isGameOver() - Method in class InvaderGameState
 
isShoot() - Method in class Enemy
Calculates whether or not the enemy is firing a missile, a trigger value is generated in the range from 1 to shootProbability, and then if this trigger value is equal to a specific value, in this case 1 then the enemy fires a missile
isShooterCollision(Shooter) - Method in class Enemy
Calculates the Euclidean distance between the enemy and a shooter and checks if the shooter and missile have collided.
isShooterCollision(Shooter) - Method in class EnemyMissile
Calculates the Euclidean distance between the missile and a shooter, and checks if the missile and shooter have collided and then returns true if a collision occurred.
isWin() - Method in class InvaderGameState
 

L

LightEnemy - Class in <Unnamed>
A model object that extends the enemy class that has properties to create an enemy that is smaller and and has less lives than a heavy enemy.
LightEnemy(double, double) - Constructor for class LightEnemy
Class constructor that creates a light enemy at the specified coordinates, light enemies have default properties of x-velocities with a magnitude of 5, y-velocities with the magnitude of 50 downwards, 2 lives and a shootProbability with a range of 1800.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Invaders
Main method that is called when the game starts.
Missile - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends DefaultCritter and serves as a model object to create different types of missiles
Missile(double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class Missile
Class constructor that creates a missile using the DefaultCritter class as a basis, also adds properties to missile by specifying the angle at which the bullet was shot.
move() - Method in class BossEnemy
Updates the movement of the boss enemy on the canvas, if the next coordinate of the boss enemy is outside the bounds of the specified boundaries of the boss enemies movement, invert the velocity of the boss enemy in that direction.
move() - Method in class Missile
 
move() - Method in class PowerUp
Moves the powerup downwards on the canvas according to its yVelocity, and sets it colour according to the type of the powerup.
move() - Method in class Shooter
Updates the shooters movement and ensures that the shooter stays within the bounds of the canvas, and ensures that the shooters barrel can't move below the horizontal.
move() - Method in class StarBackground
 
moveX() - Method in class Enemy
 
moveY() - Method in class Enemy
Moves the enemy in the y-direction, if the enemy touches the edge of the canvas then the velocity of the enemy has to be inverted and the enemy's position in the x-direction has to be updated as well.

N

NormalMissile - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that extends Missile to add extra functionality to specify a default missile type that can be used by the shooter.
NormalMissile(Shooter) - Constructor for class NormalMissile
A constructor used for when the Shooter has no power ups and a normal missile has no offset angle and only needs to be created using the coordinates of the shooter.
NormalMissile(Shooter, double) - Constructor for class NormalMissile
A second constructor that allows a NormalMissile to be instantiated at a specific angle from the barrel, this constructor is used for the tri-barrel powerup.

O

onEnemyCollision(Enemy) - Method in class Bunker
Checks if the bunker has collided with an enemy on the canvas by checking the euclidean distance between the two entities.
onMissileCollision(Missile) - Method in class Enemy
Calculates the Euclidean distance between a missile and the enemy, and checks if the missile and enemy have collided.

P

PowerUp - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that extends DefaultCritter and serves as a model object for a powerup with different effects on the shooter depending on its type.
PowerUp(int, int, double) - Constructor for class PowerUp
Creates a powerup at the specified coordinates, power ups have default y velocities with a magnitude of 8, the constructor generates a random number and assigns a type to the powerup using the method choosePowerUp.

R

radius - Variable in class DefaultCritter
 
randomWalk() - Method in class BossEnemy
Generates the next random direction that the boss enemy will move in, and changes the x-velocity, and y-velocity accordingly
readHighScores() - Static method in class HighScore
Checks if a file called high_scores.txt exists if the file doesnt exists, return an empty ArrayList of type Integer, otherwise read each individual line from the textfile and convert the line from type String to type Integer and add the Integer to the ArrayList, and then return the ArrayList of high scores.
removeLife() - Method in class Shooter
 
removeLives(int) - Method in class Enemy
Removes a certain amount of lives from the enemy
render() - Method in class BossEnemy
A method that renders the boss enemy at a specific coordinate point on the canvas using the picture method of StdDraw, the width and height of the sprite to be drawn is specified as the diameter of the sprite, and the if the boss enemy's lives are halfway depleted then change the colour of the sprite.
render() - Method in class Bunker
 
render() - Method in class EnemyMissile
 
render() - Method in class FastMissile
 
render() - Method in class HeavyEnemy
 
render() - Method in class LightEnemy
A method that renders the light enemy at a specific coordinate point on the canvas using the picture method of StdDraw, the width and height of the sprite to be drawn is specified as the diameter of the sprite.
render() - Method in class NormalMissile
 
render() - Method in class PowerUp
 
render() - Method in class Shooter
Renders the shooter on the canvas, if the shooter is player one then render it as blue, otherwise render the shooter as green
render() - Method in class StarBackground
 
render() - Method in class SuperMissile
 
renderEndGame(int, boolean) - Static method in class Invaders
Displays and renders the end game/ winner screen depending on if the player won or not.
renderEndRound(int) - Static method in class Invaders
Renders and draws the screen when the player goes to the next round.
renderMenu(boolean) - Static method in class Invaders
Renders main menu when game is first opened or when player dies.
resetState(int, int) - Method in class Shooter
Resets the shooter to its initial state and position on the canvas in the beginning of each new round

S

setPowerUp(int) - Method in class Shooter
Receives an integer powerUp which specifies which type of powerup the shooter currently has, and gives the shooter a certain amount of those missiles (if applicable - powerUpCounter specifies how many missiles of a certain type the shooter has before the powerup expires), otherwise it increases the powerups lives if the shooter has gained an extra life.
setRadialVelocityBarrel(double) - Method in class Shooter
 
setXVelocity(double) - Method in interface Critter
 
setXVelocity(double) - Method in class DefaultCritter
 
setYVelocity(double) - Method in interface Critter
 
setYVelocity(double) - Method in class DefaultCritter
 
Shooter - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that extends DefaultCritter and serves as a model object for a shooter with a barrel that can rotate and that can shoot different types of missiles
Shooter(double, double, double, double, int, boolean) - Constructor for class Shooter
Creates a shooter using the DefaultCritter class as a basis, also adds extra properties to the shooter to give the shooter a barrel that can move around with a radial velocity, and also gives the shooter the ability to obtain various power ups, with powerUpCounter specifying how many missiles of that power up type the shooter has left before his power up expires.
StarBackground - Class in <Unnamed>
A class that moves and renders the stars in the background of the main Game.
StarBackground(int, int, double) - Constructor for class StarBackground
Creates a new object of the StarBackground class with a specific starting x,y position as well as a radius for the star.
SuperMissile - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends Missile to add extra functionality for a type of missile that can be used as a super missile power up for the shooter, SuperMissiles are larger than NormalMissiles, and do much more damage.
SuperMissile(Shooter) - Constructor for class SuperMissile
Creates a SuperMissile using the Missile class as a basis, uses the shooter it is shot from to determine its starting x and y coordinates, its starting velocity and its angle specified by the shooter at that instant, as well as its radius.

W

wallBounce() - Method in class Missile
Indicates that the bullet has bounced and cannot bounce again, inverts the and and x velocity of the bullet to simulate bouncing
writeHighScores(ArrayList<Integer>) - Static method in class HighScore
Takes in an ArrayList of Integers as a parameter, and then this method checks if a file called high_scores.txt exists, if not then it creates the file, then each entry of the ArrayList is converted to a type String and then this String value is stored on a new line.

X

xCoord - Variable in class DefaultCritter
 
xVelocity - Variable in class DefaultCritter
 

Y

yCoord - Variable in class DefaultCritter
 
yVelocity - Variable in class DefaultCritter
